SENIOR EXECUTIVE CHEF
Executive Profile
To seek employment as a Executive Chef where I can offer my skills and experience
Skill Highlights
Self-motivated Training and developing of Staff. Core Accomplishments
Staff Development: Launched well-received program of professional development courses for all staff.
Mentored and coached employees resulting in a 12% increase in productivity.
